verses.verse: At the same time, Peter and John were walking up to the temple grounds at the hour of the prayer, the ninth hour (3:00 p. m.).

And a certain man who was crippled from his mother's belly was being hauled, whom they were putting daily close to the door of the temple grounds (the one called Beautiful) for the purpose to be asking for a charitable donation from the side of the people traveling onto the temple grounds,
who, when he saw Peter and John who were going to be entering onto the temple grounds, was asking for a charitable donation.
When Peter stared at him together with John, he said, "Look at us."
The man was being attentive to them, expecting to receive something from the side of them.
Peter said, "Silver and gold is not with me, but what I have, this I give to you. In the name of Jesus, the Anointed King, the Nazarene, get up and traipse around."
And when he grabbed him by the right hand, he got up. His insteps and ankles at once became solid.
And leaping up, he stood, was traipsing around, and went together with them onto the temple grounds, traipsing around, jumping, and praising God.
And the entire group saw him traipsing around and praising God.

And they were recognizing him, that this was the man who sat toward the charitable donation at the Beautiful Gate of the temple grounds, and they were filled with bewilderment and astonishment based on what had transpired with him.
As the crippled man who was cured held on to Peter and John, the entire group ran together to them at the columned shelter (the one called Solomon's), startled.

When Peter saw it, he responded to the group, "Men, Israelis, why are you amazed based on this? Or why do you stare at us as if it is with our own ability or godliness that we have done the 'for him to be traipsing around' thing?

The God of Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob, the God of our fathers, made His Servant Boy Jesus magnificent, whom you turned in and denied right in front of the face of Pilate when that man decided to be dismissing Him,
but you denied the Sacred and Right One and asked for a man, a murderer, to be given to you as an act of generosity.
You killed the Head Leader of the Life, whom God got up from the dead, of which we are witnesses.
And based on the trust of His name, His name made this man solid (whom you see and know). And the trust, the trust through Him, gave him this wholeness up in front of you all.
And now, brothers, I realize that in line with a lack of awareness you repeatedly did what you did, even as your head people also did.
This is how God accomplished things that He previously proclaimed through the mouth of all His preachers â€” for the Anointed King to suffer.
So change your ways, and return back for the 'for your sins to be erased' part in order that times of refreshment would come out of the face of the Master
and He would send out the One who has been publicly spoken about to you beforehand, Jesus, the Anointed King,
whom it is necessary for heaven to certainly accept till the times of the reestablishment of everything that God spoke of through the mouth of all His sacred preachers since the span of time began.

You see, Moses certainly said to the fathers, (in Deuteronomy 18:15) 'The Master, your God, will stand a preacher up for you from your brothers. You will listen to Him as me (Moses) regarding everything, however many things that He might speak to you.
It will be that every soul, any that do not listen to that preacher, will be eradicated from the ethnic group.'
Even all the preachers from Samuel and the preachers in order, as many as spoke, also previously proclaimed these days.
You are sons of the preachers and of the treaty that God formed facing your fathers, saying facing Abraham, 'And in your seed, all the family trees of the earth will be conferred with prosperity.'
To you first, after God brought His Servant Boy Jesus back to life, He sent Him out on a mission, conferring prosperity on you during the time for each of you to be turning away from your evils."
